name: Blindsight: War of the Wardens
description:
Blindsight: War of the Wardens is a story-driven brawler where you play as Iggy Yin, a martial arts master with echolocation abilities, as he retrieves a stolen family heirloom that may bring unintended consequences to the universe.


Throw punches and swing kicks at hordes of enemies, chaining them together to unleash epic combos! With the power of your amulet, nothing can stand in your way.

  • String together attacks, counters, dodges, and finishers with the beat-em up combat system
  • Harness your amulet to sense surrounding environments, heal between fights, and blind enemies with explosions of light
  • Face bosses on their own turf in your journey to recover the relic


In a world balanced by 5 powerful relics, there are great mysteries around every corner. On your journey to reclaim Iggy's family relic, you will travel from shrines to cities, down racing rivers, and even through portals!

  • Explore 3 distinctly themed areas, inspired by the likes of 80s kung-fu movies and EDM venues
  • Bash your way through gangs of enemies as you make your way towards boss fights
  • Use your sense of sound to "see" your way through each level


Play as Iggy, a blind martial artist who is on a quest to recover a stolen family relic. He was born into a family of wardens who protect the Relic of Life, one of five mystical relics scattered across the world. But because of his blindness, his mom wouldn't let him be a warden. When his dad goes missing and the Relic of Life is stolen by another warden family, Iggy finally gets the chance to prove himself--and find out what happened to his dad in the process.
